cf.FieldList.binary_mask¶

FieldList.binary_mask()¶

For each field, a field of the binary (0 and 1) mask of the data array.

Values of 1 indicate masked elements.

See also

mask

Examples: 
>>> f[0].shape
(12, 73, 96)
>>> m = f.binary_mask
>>> m[0].long_name
'binary_mask'
>>> m[0].shape
(12, 73, 96)
>>> m[0].dtype
dtype('int32')
>>> m[0].data
<CF Data: [[[1, ..., 0]]] >
